item.title: Introduction
item.description: Yiming Wang Mobile: 0452271021 Email: 380964885lyy@gmail.com Address: 110/8 Renver Rd, Clayton, VIC 3168 LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/yiming-wang-a52683176/ Summary of Skills • Strong researching and writing capabilities • Extensive knowledge of design and coding • Strong learning capabilities and willingness to learn new knowledge and techniques • Logical and analytic thinking to identify, analyse and solve problems • Strong communication skills and customer centric thinking pattern • Strong adaptability to multicultural working environments and ability to be the bridge of people from different culture background
